original_title: Witness to 9/11: In the Shadows of Ground Zero
overview: With never-before-seen footage, "Witness to 9/11" reveals in real time how New Yorkers struggled to make sense out of the panic, confusion, and fear gripping their city just beyond the veil of 9/11's dust on the morning of the attacks.
title: Witness to 9/11: In the Shadows of Ground Zero
